## Labs  
Every single day is an experiment - manage and be mindful of the process. #sciencejedi  

### Reading  
[Lab manual](https://figshare.com/articles/An_experimental_design_cookbook/9728204)  

### Lab report
**Marking key**  

```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
schedule <- read_csv("BIOL3250_labs.csv")
knitr::kable(schedule)
```

Lab reports must also be submitted to [turnitin.com](https://www.turnitin.com)  

**Instructions**  
Page 1. Title, name, and abstract.  
Page 2-3. Introduction.  
Page 4. Methods.  
Page 5. Results (not including figure).    
Page 6. Discussion.  
Page 7. Lit cited.  
Page 8. Figure on this page.  

Single spaced, 12 point font, at least 1 inch margins (the default).  
PDF format only.
